content.query:
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'allergies' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'dbo')
CREATE TABLE dbo.allergies
	(
	 [START] date,
	 [STOP] date,
	 [PATIENT] uniqueidentifier,
	 [ENCOUNTER] uniqueidentifier,
	 [CODE] bigint,
	 [DESCRIPTION] nvarchar(4000)
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_allergies
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO dbo.allergies
(START 1, STOP 2, PATIENT 3, ENCOUNTER 4, CODE 5, DESCRIPTION 6)
FROM 'https://minorwork12.dfs.core.windows.net/healthinsight/`allergies`.txt'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://minorwork12.dfs.core.windows.net/healthinsight/'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM dbo.allergies
GO
